name: Old Ship Hidden Object
description: Seek out hidden objects, reveal mysteries, solve puzzles as you play this new amazing Lost Ship Hidden Object game for all ages. Take a cruise on a ola ship and challenge your seeking and finding skills! Find all the hidden objects in the game. Click on an object to select it, but beware of the timer! With a lot of of locations to explore, and a fast and fun game play, this is one cruise you shouldn't miss!
